parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer client. You can call the [OnsConsumerGetConnection](~~29598~~) operation to query client IDs.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the consumer group. For information about what a consumer group is, see [Terms](~~29533~~).

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraMQ forÂ RocketMQ instance to which the specified consumer group belongs.

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: The topic to which the message is pushed.
